review: Let me start this by saying that I believe this can be put to great use. However, my expectations were very different. I wanted the chromecast to stream from tab to tv and I had a lot of issues with it. I was never aware that it could only be used with google chrome. Which could be silly of me; however, I figured that as long as I have the app and extension it should be fine. Besides that, the one time the casting did work, it was very problematic with the audio and the tv was quite a few minutes behind the actual computer. My last issue with it, I had to reset it at least once a day otherwise it wouldn't connect.
author: Vivila Rosa

review: I never knew what I was missing. I considered getting a Chromecast back when they came out, never got around to it, but now that I did, I am extremely glad I did.  Media streaming is obviously great, but the options for desktop/screen sharing make this even better.One downside is that this cannot reliably stream 1080p content from a desktop to a TV (via whole desktop sharing) but this is really not its intended purpose.Definitely recommend.
